title: Linda, Are you old enough to drink today?
author: dezcom

comments.content: Well, OK, those 96 cans will last me the first hour, but what else did you bring? ;-)
Happy birthday, Linda! Will tomorrow's headlines scream of mad debauchery and wanton celebrations, maybe even rioting in the streets of Calgary?
Happy Birthday! And Happy Day of the Dead too!
Here's to a hoppy birthday. ;-)
Happy Birthday, Linda!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111201145056im_/http:/typophile.com/files/linda_6193.png)

Have a very happy birthday, Linda. Cheers!  
(pours another round)  
yeah, haf a berry happa burfday, leender.  
(pours another round)  
did I shay haffy burtdy to you minda?

ROFL!

Tamye, by the end of today, I know I will have a new vice and some Gopher Guts, does that count? (And I'm never mad when I debauch!)

Brilliant sheep, Florian: does this mean I can go out and be a baaaaaaaad girl?

You're a cheap date, Norbert -- my kind of guy.

(Now if I can only find some nice Boy Scout to help this little old lady across the street....) ;-)
Happy birthday, Linda!!
Too funny! Happy Birthday, Linda!! May all your spinning be in the right direction and your head hit the pillow safely after all your debauching.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111201145056im_/http:/typophile.com/files/linda_3667.jpg)

happy single malt day, linda!

chuck

Linda

We'll have to raise a pint or two at the next Typo Calgary meeting.

Till then  
David

Nice hackle, Chuck! You just wait until I post pictures of my take on a Copper John or a Wooly Bugger.

David, if you're coming to the show reception on Saturday, I think we're going out for a couple after it's over....

Thanks so much, everyone -- as some of you know, this has been a real up-and-down year and I appreciate the good thinking bits.

And the booze.... (hic)

;-)
Oy, not too late, am I? Happilicious birthdebauchery, Linda!

You're kewl, Yves. ;-)

And strangely enough, there's been no single-malt, no beer, and no chocolate....

(Just green tea, wine, Dubonnet Ambre, Triple Sec, and a flowering George!)
Happy Birthday Linda! Hope it's a great one. Should I make a phone call??

Happy Belated Cumpleaños, Linda!  
Best wishes from this slightly enebriated guy...

R.
Happy Birthday, Linda!

Happy Birthday!  
Feliz Cumpleanos!  
S Dnem Rozjdeniya! (russian ;) )

Hm, I'm way too late. But happy belated birthday anyway! :)  
Or if we're going to boast different languages; nog gefeliciteerd met je verjaardag! (Dutch).
If "Happy Birthday" is the most sung song in the world, perhaps writing "happy birthday" in a multitude of languages would be one form of brute force testing for fonts? ;-)
Bon Anniversaire!!! :-)

Hm, I don't know what it is in other languages...  
Oh yes, German should be: Zum Geburtstag viel Glück. I think.
Sorry I'm late, Linda!!! Happy birthday girl!!!!
Désolé, je ne connais pas Linda, mais je lui souhaite tout de même un très bel anniversaire et une excellente année.

What I find quite odd are the people (um, guys) who think "Linda" is a male name.

Je ne suis pas un homme. Vraiment!
Does that mean we're supposed to write "Bonne" instead of "Bon," bonnie lass? :-)
No you're not Mili. ;-)
If she's not Mili, then who is she?

Mili Lite :-)

ChrisL
(shakes head) You boys.... ;-)
Oh, it wouldn't have been on to rub it in on your birthday, I won't be as gracious in the future.

:-)

ChrisL
